survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with workplace ergonomics and identify areas for improvement to enhance comfort and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic design of your workstation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic design of your workstation?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Ensure options are clear and concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. Avoid leading language.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your workstation ergonomics?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your workstation ergonomics?

questions.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or guidance from your employer?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question with an unsure option to avoid forcing a response.

script.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or guidance from your employer?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, how helpful was the ergonomic training or guidance?
questions.client_notes: Conditional question. Use a 4-point scale for simplicity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Routing logic depends on Q5 response.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, how helpful was the ergonomic training or guidance?

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Frequency-based question with specific intervals for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?

questions.question_text: Do you feel your employer prioritizes ergonomic comfort in the workplace?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure agreement. Avoid double-barreled questions.

script.question_text: Do you feel your employer prioritizes ergonomic comfort in the workplace?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in an ergonomic assessment of your workstation?
questions.client_notes: Optional participation question with nuanced response options.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in an ergonomic assessment of your workstation?

questions.question_text: Any additional comments or concerns about workplace ergonomics?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any remaining feedback. Keep it optional.

script.question_text: Any additional comments or concerns about workplace ergonomics?
